name: The Impossible Whopper
description: A 100% vegetarian burger with a patty manufactured by Impossible Foods. Test marketed in April 2019 in St. Louis, Missouri, with a nationwide rollout in August 2019.

name: The Windows 7 Whopper
description: Sold in Japan for the promotion of Microsoft's Windows 7, featuring seven beef patties. Available initially for seven days in October 2009, extended due to popularity.

name: The Pizza Burger
description: Exclusive to BK Whopper Bar in Times Square, introduced in September 2010. Four Whopper patties on a 9.5 inch bun, with pepperoni, mozzarella, basil pesto, and marinara sauce.

name: The Angry Whopper
description: Features jalapenos, 'Angry Sauce' and 'Angry Onions', pepper jack cheese, and bacon. Originated in Europe, with a US introduction in 2008. The Angriest Whopper, with a red bun and hot pepper sauce, debuted in 2016.
unique_features: Red bun with hot pepper sauce
variations: Angriest Whopper with a red bun

name: The BK 1/4 lb Burger
description: A direct competitor to McDonald's Quarter Pounder, consisting of a Whopper with ketchup, mustard, pickle, and onions.
unique_features: Direct competitor to McDonald's Quarter Pounder

name: The Whopperito
description: A burrito containing all the ingredients of the Whopper, with queso sauce instead of ketchup, mayonnaise, or mustard. Introduced in Pennsylvania in June 2016, with a nationwide rollout in August.

name: Philippines Variants
description: Notable variants in the Philippines include the 3-Meat Whopper, Meat Beast Whopper, and 4-Cheese Whopper, with limited-time variants like the Bacon 4-Cheese Whopper and Cheetos 4-Cheese Crunch.

name: The Rebel Whopper
description: Introduced in Australia by Hungry Jack's in October 2019 and in other countries subsequently. Features a meat-free patty made from legumes or by The Vegetarian Butcher.

name: Discontinued Variants - Chicken Whopper
description: Introduced for the 45th anniversary of the Whopper in 2002 as part of Burger King's move to extend the Whopper brand beyond beef. Featured a whole chicken breast filet.

name: Whooper Challenge
description: Le Whooper Challenge invite les clients à manger un Whooper en une seule bouchée !
